subject: problem with one time setup suite in a testcase conflict
msgSnippet: I have a TestCase in which I define a suite method so that I may do a one time setup for all the tests within that  that TestCase. Lets say TestCaseA I have
messageBody:
I have a TestCase in which I define a suite method so that I may do a
one time setup for all the tests within that that TestCase. Lets say
TestCaseA


I have some other TestCases (none have a single setup like above)
defined as well. Lets call it TestCaseB, TestCaseC.


I have an AllTest object to test alll of the above.

It seems that as soon as I add the TestCase with the single setup
schecme (TestCaseA), to my AllTest, the TestCase.suite() which does
the single time setup never gets called and subsequently my TestCaseA
with the suite method fails.

All the other TestCases (TestCaseB, TestCaseC) work alright with the
AllTest.suite().


I don't underestand the framework well enough to know what is going
on. Is it that the AllTest.suite() is being used instead of any other
single setup suite method of all other testcase?

How can I have a single setup specific to a TestCase and yet be able
to run it as part of AllTest?

hel[/
